scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Printed announcement and an envelope postmarked January 31, 1907, from Henry Chapman to Bauman L. Belden (American Numismatic Society librarian, secretary, director, and council member) describing the upcoming auction of various early American silver and gold coins and patterns owned by David S. Wilson.
